absorb.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If the target has a substitute, this move misses.

acid.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
acid.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

amnesia.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
amnesia.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Def by 2.

aurorabeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
aurorabeam.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

barrage.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

bide.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and then, on the second or third turn after using this move, the user attacks the opponent, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost during those turns. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not ignore type immunity.

bind.desc: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
bind.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

bite.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

bonemerang.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

bubble.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubble.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

bubblebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubblebeam.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

clamp.desc: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
clamp.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

cometpunch.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

constrict.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
constrict.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

conversion.desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of one of its known moves besides Curse, at random, but not either of its current types. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
conversion.shortDesc: Changes user's type to match a known move.

counter.desc: Deals damage to the opposing Pokemon equal to twice the HP lost by the user from a physical attack this turn. This move considers Hidden Power as Normal type, and only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user moves first, if the user was not hit by a physical attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack. If the opposing Pokemon used Fissure or Horn Drill and missed, this move deals 65535 damage.

defensecurl.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. While the user remains active, the power of the user's Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable). Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.

dig.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake, Fissure, and Magnitude, the user is unaffected by weather, and Earthquake and Magnitude have doubled power when used against the user.

disable.desc: For 1 to 7 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move has 0 PP.
disable.shortDesc: For 1-7 turns, disables the target's last move.

dizzypunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

doublekick.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

doubleslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. If this move hits a substitute, the recoil damage is always 1 HP.

dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep and does not have a substitute. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

earthquake.desc: Power doubles if the target is using Dig.

explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation.

fireblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

firespin.desc: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
firespin.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

fissure.desc: Deals 65535 damage to the target. This attack's accuracy out of 256 is equal to the lesser of (2 * (user's level - target's level) + 76) and 255, before applying accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. Fails if the target is at a higher level. Can hit a target using Dig.
fissure.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

fly.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Thunder, Twister, and Whirlwind, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it.

focusenergy.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 1 stage. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
focusenergy.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 1.

furyattack.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

glare.desc: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

growth.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
growth.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

guillotine.desc: Deals 65535 damage to the target. This attack's accuracy out of 256 is equal to the lesser of (2 * (user's level - target's level) + 76) and 255, before applying accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. Fails if the target is at a higher level.
guillotine.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

gust.desc: Power doubles if the target is using Fly.

haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful and the target was not immune, the user loses HP equal to 1/8 the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP, as crash damage.
highjumpkick.shortDesc: If miss, user takes 1/8 damage it would've dealt.

horndrill.desc: Deals 65535 damage to the target. This attack's accuracy out of 256 is equal to the lesser of (2 * (user's level - target's level) + 76) and 255, before applying accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. Fails if the target is at a higher level.
horndrill.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

jumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful and the target was not immune, the user loses HP equal to 1/8 the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP, as crash damage.
jumpkick.shortDesc: If miss, user takes 1/8 damage it would've dealt.

leechseed.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Rapid Spin, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.

lightscreen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members have their Special Defense doubled. Critical hits ignore this effect. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
lightscreen.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user's party has doubled Sp. Def.

metronome.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than Counter, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, or Thief.

mimic.desc: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has 5 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Struggle.
mimic.shortDesc: The last move the target used replaces this one.

minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Stomp will have its power doubled if used against the user while it is active. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.

mirrormove.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used was Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Transform, or any move the user knows.

mist.desc: While the user remains active, it is protected from having its stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.

nightshade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
nightshade.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

petaldance.desc: Whether or not this move is successful, the user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect, even if it is already confused. If the user is prevented from moving, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

poisonsting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

rage.desc: Once this move is successfully used, X starts at 1. This move's damage is multiplied by X, and whenever the user is hit by the opposing Pokemon, X increases by 1, with a maximum of 255. X resets to 1 when the user is no longer active or did not choose this move for use.
rage.shortDesc: Next Rage increases in damage if hit during use.

razorwind.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second.
razorwind.shortDesc: Charges, then hits target turn 2. High crit ratio.

recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members have their Defense doubled. Critical hits ignore this effect. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user's party has doubled Def.

rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any major status condition in the process, even if it was already asleep. Fails if the user has full HP.

roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the user moves before the target.
roar.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

seismictoss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
seismictoss.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

selfdestruct.desc: The user faints after using this move. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation.

skullbash.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn.
skullbash.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

sludge.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

softboiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Damage is halved if the weather is Rain Dance. If the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.
solarbeam.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

sonicboom.desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.

spikecannon.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

stomp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Power doubles if the target is under the effect of Minimize.

struggle.desc: Deals typeless damage. If this move was successful, the user takes damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
struggle.shortDesc: User loses 1/4 the HP lost by the target.

stunspore.desc: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. If this move hits a substitute, the recoil damage is always 1 HP.

substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

swift.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
swift.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

takedown.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. If this move hits a substitute, the recoil damage is always 1 HP.

thrash.desc: Whether or not this move is successful, the user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect, even if it is already confused. If the user is prevented from moving, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
thrash.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

thunder.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Fly. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.
thunder.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze. Can't miss in rain.

transform.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, DVs, species, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP. This move fails if the target has transformed.

triattack.desc: This move selects burn, freeze, or paralysis at random, and has a 20% chance to inflict the target with that status. If the target is frozen and burn was selected, it thaws out.
triattack.shortDesc: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

twineedle.desc: Hits twice, with the second hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit but the target cannot be poisoned by it.

whirlwind.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the user moves before the target.
whirlwind.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

wrap.desc: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
wrap.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

ancientpower.name: Ancient Power
ancientpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).
ancientpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

attract.name: Attract
attract.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.
attract.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active.

batonpass.name: Baton Pass
batonpass.shortDesc: User switches, passing stat changes and more.
batonpass.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.

beatup.name: Beat Up
beatup.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.
beatup.desc: Deals typeless damage. Hits one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a major status condition in the user's party. For each hit, the damage formula uses the participating Pokemon's level, its base Attack as the Attack stat, the target's base Defense as the Defense stat, and ignores stat stages and other effects that modify Attack or Defense. Fails if no party members can participate.

bellydrum.name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.
bellydrum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.

bonerush.name: Bone Rush
bonerush.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

conversion2.name: Conversion 2
conversion2.shortDesc: Changes user's type to resist the foe's last move.
conversion2.desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the opposing Pokemon, even it is one of the user's current types. The original type of the move is used rather than the determined type. Fails if the opposing Pokemon has not used a move.

cottonspore.name: Cotton Spore
cottonspore.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

crosschop.name: Cross Chop
crosschop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
crunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

curse.name: Curse
curse.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.
curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage, unless the user's Attack and Defense stats are both at stage 6. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if the target is already affected or has a substitute.

destinybond.name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.
destinybond.desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well.

detect.name: Detect
detect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.
detect.desc: The user is protected from attacks made by the opponent during this turn. This move has an X/255 chance of being successful, where X starts at 255 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 255 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user has a substitute or moves last this turn.

dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonbreath.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

encore.name: Encore
encore.shortDesc: The target repeats its last move for 3-6 turns.
encore.desc: For 3 to 6 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Encore, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, or Transform.

endure.name: Endure
endure.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.
endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by the opponent during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has an X/255 chance of being successful, where X starts at 255 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 255 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user has a substitute or moves last this turn.

falseswipe.name: False Swipe
falseswipe.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

feintattack.name: Feint Attack
feintattack.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

flail.name: Flail
flail.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.
flail.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down. This move does not apply damage variance and cannot be a critical hit.

flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel
flamewheel.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.
flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.
foresight.desc: As long as the target remains active, if its evasiveness stat stage is greater than the attacker's accuracy stat stage, both are ignored during accuracy checks, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. Fails if the target is already affected.

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

furycutter.name: Fury Cutter
furycutter.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.
furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.
futuresight.desc: Deals typeless damage that cannot be a critical hit two turns after this move is used. Damage is calculated against the target on use, and at the end of the final turn that damage is dealt to the Pokemon at the position the original target had at the time. Fails if this move is already in effect for the target's position.

gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down.

healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition.

hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power
hiddenpower.shortDesc: Varies in power and type based on the user's IVs.
hiddenpower.desc: This move's type and power depend on the user's individual values (IVs). Power varies between 30 and 70, and type can be any but Normal.

icywind.name: Icy Wind
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

irontail.name: Iron Tail
irontail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

lockon.name: Lock-On
lockon.shortDesc: The next move will not miss the target.
lockon.desc: The next accuracy check against the target succeeds. The target will still avoid Earthquake, Fissure, and Magnitude if it is using Fly. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement remains under this effect. This effect ends when the target leaves the field or an accuracy check is done against it.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.
magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies. 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Power doubles if the target is using Dig.

meanlook.name: Mean Look
meanlook.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.
meanlook.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

metalclaw.name: Metal Claw
metalclaw.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.
metalclaw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

milkdrink.name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
milkdrink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

mindreader.name: Mind Reader
mindreader.shortDesc: The next move will not miss the target.
mindreader.desc: The next accuracy check against the target succeeds. The target will still avoid Earthquake, Fissure, and Magnitude if it is using Fly. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement remains under this effect. This effect ends when the target leaves the field or an accuracy check is done against it.

mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.
mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the opposing Pokemon equal to twice the HP lost by the user from a special attack this turn. This move considers Hidden Power as Normal type, and only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user moves first, if the user was not hit by a special attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.
moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, all of its HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Rain Dance or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

morningsun.name: Morning Sun
morningsun.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.
morningsun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, all of its HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Rain Dance or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

mudslap.name: Mud-Slap
mudslap.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
mudslap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.
nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.

octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
octazooka.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.
outrage.desc: Whether or not this move is successful, the user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect, even if it is already confused. If the user is prevented from moving, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

painsplit.name: Pain Split
painsplit.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.
painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.

perishsong.name: Perish Song
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.
perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.

powdersnow.name: Powder Snow
powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

present.name: Present
present.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.
present.desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 102/256 chance for 40 power, 76/256 chance for 80 power, 26/256 chance for 120 power, or 52/256 chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. If this move deals damage, it uses an abnormal version of the damage formula by substituting certain values. The user's Attack stat is replaced with 10 times the effectiveness of this move against the target, the target's Defense stat is replaced with the index number of the user's secondary type, and the user's level is replaced with the index number of the target's secondary type. If a Pokemon does not have a secondary type, its primary type is used. The index numbers for each type are Normal: 0, Fighting: 1, Flying: 2, Poison: 3, Ground: 4, Rock: 5, Bug: 7, Ghost: 8, Steel: 9, Fire: 20, Water: 21, Grass: 22, Electric: 23, Psychic: 24, Ice: 25, Dragon: 26, Dark: 27. If at any point a division by 0 would happen in the damage formula, it divides by 1 instead.

protect.name: Protect
protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.
protect.desc: The user is protected from attacks made by the opponent during this turn. This move has an X/255 chance of being successful, where X starts at 255 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 255 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user has a substitute or moves last this turn.

psychup.name: Psych Up
psychup.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.
psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes. Fails if the target's stat stages are 0.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.shortDesc: Power doubles if the foe is switching out.
pursuit.desc: If the target switches out this turn, this move hits it before it leaves the field with doubled power and the user's turn is over.

raindance.name: Rain Dance
raindance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.
raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance, even if the current weather is Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect.

rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.shortDesc: Frees user from hazards, binding, Leech Seed.
rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and Spikes are removed from the user's side of the field.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.
reversal.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down. This move does not apply damage variance and cannot be a critical hit.

rocksmash.name: Rock Smash
rocksmash.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
rocksmash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.
rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.

sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire
sacredfire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.
sacredfire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.
safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have major status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. During the effect, Outrage, Thrash, and Petal Dance do not confuse the user. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.

scaryface.name: Scary Face
scaryface.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.shortDesc: Fails when used in Link Battles.
sketch.desc: Fails when used in Link Battles.

sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.
sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Bide, Sleep Talk, or any two-turn move.

sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

snore.name: Snore
snore.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.
snore.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Fails if the user is not asleep.

spark.name: Spark
spark.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

spiderweb.name: Spider Web
spiderweb.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.
spiderweb.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 1 layer.
spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, causing each opposing Pokemon that switches in to lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin successfully.

spite.name: Spite
spite.shortDesc: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 2-5.
spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 2 to 5 PP, at random. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the move has 0 PP.

steelwing.name: Steel Wing
steelwing.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.
steelwing.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.

sunnyday.name: Sunny Day
sunnyday.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.
sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day, even if the current weather is Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.
swagger.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it. This move will miss if the target's Attack cannot be raised.

sweetkiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweetkiss.shortDesc: Causes the target to become confused.

sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent
sweetscent.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.
synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, all of its HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Rain Dance or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

thief.name: Thief
thief.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.
thief.desc: Has a 100% chance to steal the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail.

triplekick.name: Triple Kick
triplekick.shortDesc: Hits 1-3 times. Power rises with each hit.
triplekick.desc: Hits one to three times, at random. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third.

twister.name: Twister
twister.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Power doubles if the target is using Fly.

vitalthrow.name: Vital Throw
vitalthrow.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Goes last.
vitalthrow.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.
whirlpool.desc: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

zapcannon.name: Zap Cannon
zapcannon.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
